articles.title: 'Give PSL calendar too': PCB chief's outburst on Jay Shah shakes cricket world - Hindustan Times
articles.description: PCB chairman Najam Sethi took a shot at Jay Shah – who is the president of Asian Cricket Council – after the latter presented the pathway structure and cricketing calendar for the Asian Cricket for 2023 and 2024 seasons. | Cricket
